text:
:boom:  *January updates for UI extensions*

*Progress bar component*
Use the new <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/create-custom-crm-cards-with-projects#progress-bar|progress bar> component to visually render a numeric and/or percentage-based representation to track progress.

*Add HTML link to Buttons*
Add an HTML link to either HubSpot or external pages on the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/create-custom-crm-cards-with-projects#button|button> component.

*More code samples*
Our public <https://github.com/HubSpot/ui-extensions-examples|code samples repository> now contains more examples of integrations with external sources.
    ◦ Google Maps
    ◦ Walkscore
    ◦ Asana
---------
Ways to connect with us:

• Use `hs feedback` on CLI, or <https://forms.gle/Fg3k6BmLCDegUx8Z9|Feedback form>
• <https://HubSpot.com/meetings/mhazlewood2/dpg-feedback-interview|Talk to us>
• <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C04A3FUK8HK/p1668107394841849|Slack channel> or <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CRM-Development-Tools-Beta/gh-p/crm-development-tools-beta|community group>

Hi Team, Can any one help me how to change the existing body content dynamically in HubSpot CRM card when we click on different buttons below or serverless function how to receive the response.      On below second image I displayed alert message only not able to refresh the content for exsting CRM card. Please help me
